task.title: Using the Fraction Converter
task.shortdesc: This topic describes how to use the Fraction Converter to convert decimal time into time expressed as hours, minutes and seconds.

taskbody.context: This procedure explains how to convert time expressed as a decimal into time expressed as hours, minutes and seconds.

step.cmd: In the Fraction Converter pane, type the decimal time you want to convert in the Fraction Converter field.

choices.choice: If the decimal time is in hours, select Hrs below the Fraction Converter field.
If the decimal time is in minutes, select Min below the Fraction Converter field.

taskbody.result: The time you converted appears in the Hrs, Min and Sec fields in the Fraction Converter pane.
taskbody.example:
For example, to convert 10.26 hours into a time expressed as hours, minutes and seconds, in the
Fraction Converter pane type 10.25 in the Fraction Converter field. Select Hrs below the Fraction Converter field, then click Convert. The result of 10 hours 15 min 36 sec appears in the Hrs, Min and Sec fields in the Fraction Converter pane.
